publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-1637# Mr Jamie McGrigor:Olympic Success—That the Parliament congratulates Team GB on its achievement in winning 30 medals at the Games of the 28th Olympiad and Greece and Athens on hosting such an outstanding games; further congratulates Kelly Holmes on winning the historic double of both the 800m and 1500m, Matthew Pinsent for winning his fourth gold medal, Scots Shirley Robertson and Chris Hoy for their golds in the sailing and cycling and Campbell Walsh and Katherine Grainger for their silver medals; believes that the interest generated by the team’s success, and the Olympics in general, must be maximised by both local sports associations and clubs and national sports bodies, and considers that the Scottish Executive should place a higher priority on sports and encourage efforts to ensure that competitive sport is available to all children in Scotland.
